items.title: Difficulty
items.description: A Difficulty that will be available within the Ruleset.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the difficulty level.

baseHappiness.title: Base Happiness
baseHappiness.description: The base happiness value provided at this difficulty.

extraHappinessPerLuxury.title: Extra Happiness Per Luxury
extraHappinessPerLuxury.description: Additional happiness gained per luxury resource.

researchCostModifier.title: Research Cost Modifier
researchCostModifier.description: Multiplier for research costs at this difficulty.

unitSupplyBase.title: Unit Supply Base
unitSupplyBase.description: Base number of units that can be supplied.

unitSupplyPerCity.title: Unit Supply Per City
unitSupplyPerCity.description: Additional unit supply provided per city.

barbarianBonus.title: Barbarian Bonus
barbarianBonus.description: Bonus applied to barbarians at this difficulty.

barbarianSpawnDelay.title: Barbarian Spawn Delay
barbarianSpawnDelay.description: Number of turns before barbarians start spawning.

playerBonusStartingUnits.title: Player Bonus Starting Units
playerBonusStartingUnits.description: Units given to human players at the start. Can also be 'Era Starting Unit', which maps to startingMilitaryUnit of the Eras file. All other units must be in Units.json. Applies only to human player civs.

aiDifficultyLevel.title: AI Difficulty Level
aiDifficultyLevel.description: Difficulty level used for AI modifiers. If empty, defaults to Chieftain or the first available difficulty.

aiCityGrowthModifier.title: AI City Growth Modifier
aiCityGrowthModifier.description: Multiplier for AI city growth rate.

aiUnitCostModifier.title: AI Unit Cost Modifier
aiUnitCostModifier.description: Multiplier for AI unit production costs.

aiBuildingCostModifier.title: AI Building Cost Modifier
aiBuildingCostModifier.description: Multiplier for AI building production costs.

aiWonderCostModifier.title: AI Wonder Cost Modifier
aiWonderCostModifier.description: Multiplier for AI wonder production costs.

aiBuildingMaintenanceModifier.title: AI Building Maintenance Modifier
aiBuildingMaintenanceModifier.description: Multiplier for AI building maintenance costs.

aiUnitMaintenanceModifier.title: AI Unit Maintenance Modifier
aiUnitMaintenanceModifier.description: Multiplier for AI unit maintenance costs.

aiUnitSupplyModifier.title: AI Unit Supply Modifier
aiUnitSupplyModifier.description: Modifier for the number of units the AI can supply.

aiFreeTechs.title: AI Free Techs
aiFreeTechs.description: Technologies granted to AI at the start.

aiMajorCivBonusStartingUnits.title: AI Major Civ Bonus Starting Units
aiMajorCivBonusStartingUnits.description: Units given to AI major civilizations at the start.

aiCityStateBonusStartingUnits.title: AI City-State Bonus Starting Units
aiCityStateBonusStartingUnits.description: Units given to AI city-states at the start.

turnBarbariansCanEnterPlayerTiles.title: Turn Barbarians Can Enter Player Tiles
turnBarbariansCanEnterPlayerTiles.description: Turn number after which barbarians can enter player tiles.

clearBarbarianCampReward.title: Clear Barbarian Camp Reward
clearBarbarianCampReward.description: Gold reward for clearing a barbarian camp.
